column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered the braised beef sandwich. I originally wanted the bbq pulled pork sandwich
column2: but they weren't serving that. Maybe we went too early. The bottom of my bun was super wet and somewhat soggy
column3: but I wonder if that's how it's supposed to be. It was really good. Very messy to eat though. My BF ordered the sourdough pancakes
column4: and he LOVED it. I thought they were average
column5: but I don't love pancakes like he does.
